text: The Poland national rugby league team (Polska XIII) represent Poland in international rugby league football competitions throughout Europe and around the World. Polska XIII competed in the 2018 Emerging Nations World Championship in Sydney playing in the second tier tournament going through undefeated to win the Trophy defeating the Philippines 14-10 in the final. ==Current Squad== Squad selected for the 2018 Emerging Nations World Championship;https://www.rlenwc.com/teams/poland/ Poland RLENWC {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !
